BR_text.BRsummary: Document which platforms turicreate is able to support GPU acceleration.
BR_text.BRdescription:
It's helpful that  communicates at runtime that <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/blob/v4.1/src/unity/python/turicreate/toolkits/_mxnet_utils.py#L85>"Using GPUs is currently not supported on Mac"</denchmark-link>
 . However, runtime feedback can be a little late in a setup process (e.g. after working through how to install MXNet from source with CUDA support on a Mac).
 Could this limitation be mentioned in the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/blob/master/README.md#gpu-support>GPU documentation</denchmark-link>
 ? It may help some Mac enthusiasts with NVIDIA cards find this out early and avoid going down the road of trying to setup GPU support for   on their Mac.
